note:
Ancient NYC based software dev / devops guy. Reluctant sysadmin and infosec person.

Grew up on Long Island and spent many years racing sailboats on the Sound after I learned how to sail when I lived in Cleveland.

Recovering audiophile geek. I no longer own anything that requires matched EL34s. Live music junkie making up for lost time since bands started touring again. Still trying to figure out how and when alt-country became Americana.

Oh yeah: he/him.
